headline: BofA Adjusts Motorola Solutions, Inc. (MSI) PT on Backlog Timing Challenges
summary: Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI) is among the 9 Best Video Surveillance and Private Security Stocks to Buy. Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI) is among the best video surveillance stocks. TheFly reported on February 12 that BofA Securities lowered its price target for MSI to $500 from $520 and gave it a Buy rating. Although the firm still anticipates improving demand patterns […]

headline: How Record Backlog and New FedRAMP AI Wins Could Reshape Motorola Solutions’ (MSI) Investment Narrative
summary: In February 2026, Motorola Solutions reported fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$3,380 million and net income of US$649 million, alongside full-year revenue of US$11.68 billion and net income of US$2.15 billion, while also updating progress on its long-running US$16.92 billion share repurchase program. At the same time, the company highlighted a record US$15.70 billion backlog and new FedRAMP High security authorizations for its AI-enabled SVX body-worn assistant and CommandCentral DEMS cloud...

At the same time, the company highlighted a record US$15.70 billion backlog and new FedRAMP High security authorizations for its AI-enabled SVX body-worn assistant and CommandCentral DEMS cloud...

headline: Jason Winkler, Executive Vice President and CFO, Motorola Solutions to Participate in Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference
summary: CHICAGO, February 23, 2026--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI), a global leader in public safety and enterprise security, today announced that Jason Winkler, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will participate at the upcoming Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference on Monday, March 2, 2026, at 4:50 p.m. PST.

content.title: Jason Winkler, Executive Vice President and CFO, Motorola Solutions to Participate in Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference
content.summary: CHICAGO, February 23, 2026--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI), a global leader in public safety and enterprise security, today announced that Jason Winkler, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will participate at the upcoming Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference on Monday, March 2, 2026, at 4:50 p.m. PST.

headline: Greg Brown, Chairman and CEO, Motorola Solutions to Participate in Raymond James Institutional Investors Conference
summary: CHICAGO, February 23, 2026--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI), a global leader in public safety and enterprise security, today announced that Greg Brown, Chairman and CEO, will participate at the upcoming Raymond James Institutional Investors Conference on Monday, March 2, 2026, at 9:50 a.m. EST.
